question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding CRZ-1 under Coastal Regulation Zone Notification 2011?
1) It includes ecologically sensitive areas like mangroves, coral reefs, biosphere reserves, etc.
2) No new construction shall be permitted in CRZ-I in any circumstances.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: CRZ-1 includes ecologically sensitive areas like mangroves, coral reefs, biosphere reserves, etc. No new construction activities are allowed except any project under the Department of Atomic Energy or Construction of trans-harbour sea link.
